sprint_summary.sprint_goal: Implement critical security features and fix configuration issues to deliver a production-ready template

atomic_tasks.title: Create security-audit.yml workflow file

acceptance_criteria: Workflow file created with all security scanners
Workflow triggers on push and PR

atomic_tasks.title: Configure .prettierrc settings
atomic_tasks.description: Create proper Prettier configuration and fix formatting issues
